results.title: Rambo Issues 1985
results.brief_description: A current affairs style program, with panel members - including Phillip Adams and Max Teichman - discussing the political and moral implications of the film “Rambo”. Excerpts from Rambo are discussed alongside recorded interviews with a Vietnam veteran and a representative from a South American refugee organisation.

results.title: Raku - English style
results.creator_credit: John Anderson, Robert Fournier and Castle Hill Brenchley
results.brief_description: A group of English potters demonstrate how Raku pottery is made, glazed and fired. The commentator clearly explains how the kiln is made while the potters construct one and use it.

results.title: Rajput glory
results.creator_credit: R Bacha, D R D Productions and Film Group of India
results.brief_description: Shows the magnificent architectural wonders of Rajasthan (Jaipur) and, in this courtly setting, the “ghoomar” dances performed by the women of Rajasthan.

results.title: Rainforest: the struggle for light
results.creator_credit: Peter Bull and Queensland. Dept. of Education. Media Services
results.brief_description:
Considers the interaction between sunlight and rainforest vegetation. Introduces concepts such as adaptation and succession.
Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Railroaders
results.creator_credit: Guy L. Cote and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A film about winter railroading in the Canadian Rockies and the men who keep the lines clear. The stretch between Revelstoke and Field, British Columbia, is a snow-choked threat to communications. The film shows the work of section hands, maintenance men, train crews and telegraph operators. (Award: Locarno)
results.creator_credit_for_label: Guy L. Cote and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: Radio Tirana: harmony and forschung
results.creator_credit: Helmut Stadlmann, Michael Langoth and Trizeps Video
results.brief_description: A collaboration between avant-garde video makers and musicians which utilises computer animation, video collage, and media cut-ups to present some cutting edge music compositions. An Austrian production, this video is an excellent introduction to the experimental sounds of European electronic and industrial music.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Helmut Stadlmann, Michael Langoth and Trizeps Video

results.title: Radio Dog
results.brief_description: In Albion, an anarchist republic of the near future, Felix is listening to Radio Dog as he shaves off his beard. His daydreams gradually form a kaleidoscope portrait of the mongrel city, where doctors serve liquid sunshine on the concrete beach and savage diesel rhythms shake the massive Gun Fetish Club.

results.title: Radiance
results.creator_credit: Rachel Perkins, Andrew Myer, Ned Lander and Eclipse Films (Australia)
results.brief_description: Three sisters are reunited after the death of their mother; their lifestyles a world apart from each other. Eldest sister Cressy (Rachael Maza), has found success as a classical singer and rejected her past life to pursue a career overseas. Middle daughter Mae (Trisha Morton-Thomas) resents Cressy’s success and feels bitter at being the one whose had to stay behind to care for their senile mother. Youngest sister Nona (Deborah Mailman), is vibrant, sexually promiscuous, pregnant, and unlike her sisters, loyal to the memory of their mother. In the brief time the sisters spend together, they learn the painful memories and secrets that has distanced them from one another, and as the family’s intrigue is revealed the sisters can finally unite together.

results.title: Raiders of the lost ark
results.creator_credit: Steven Spielberg, Frank Marshall, Lucasfilm, Ltd. and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Harrison Ford immortalised the character of thrillseeker archaeologist Indiana Jones in this first of the series. From the opening sequence filled with huge crawling tarantulas, golden idols and giant rolling stones, “Raiders of the lost ark” is a rollercoaster of thrills and action. Jones is on a mission to find the missing Lost Ark of the Covenant and encounters evil Nazi’s, slithering snakes, mummified bodies and red tape before he achieves his mission. Co-starring Karen Allen and Denholm Elliott. A great movie from master blockbuster filmmakers George Lucas and Steven Spielberg.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Steven Spielberg, Frank Marshall, Lucasfilm, Ltd. and Paramount Pictures

results.title: Racing silver: German Motorracing 1900-1971
results.creator_credit: Michael J. Churchill, Neville Hay and Duke Marketing
results.brief_description: Motoring authority Neville Hay takes a fascinating journey through the archives of Mercedes Benz and Auto Union from 1900 to the late 1960s. We also take a look at Porsche and BMW as he sheds light on the innovative design, construction and magnificent drivers (such as Fangio, Moss, Caracciola, Lang and Nuvolari) which brought these manufacturers extraordinary success in Grand Prix and sports car racing during those years.
